title: So how did this get removed?

replies.body: {{champion:267}} As the moderator UIanopo stated on your other post about this "posts that have the purpose of harassing, belittling, demeaning or insulting others are not considered "jokes" and are subject to moderation."

> [{quoted}](name=Evangele,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=lvLziBRd,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-09-06T01:38:58.088+0000)
>
> {{champion:267}} As the moderator UIanopo stated on your other post about this "posts that have the purpose of harassing, belittling, demeaning or insulting others are not considered "jokes" and are subject to moderation."

whos ulunpo
[You know, Ulanpo, the longtime boards moderator (title, Advisor)](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/LZ0eNgrM-a-new-revised-boards-team-approaches)

> [{quoted}](name=Evangele,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=lvLziBRd,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-09-06T01:38:58.088+0000)
>
> {{champion:267}} As the moderator UIanopo stated on your other post about this "posts that have the purpose of harassing, belittling, demeaning or insulting others are not considered "jokes" and are subject to moderation."

When will you remove the transphobic hate speech that I reported days ago?

> [{quoted}](name=Jeffreak15,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=lvLziBRd,comment-id=00030002,timestamp=2018-09-06T03:48:27.133+0000)
>
> When will you remove the transphobic hate speech that I reported days ago?

Take this to the NA boards moderation Discord.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification

> [{quoted}](name=Evangele,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=lvLziBRd,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-09-06T01:38:58.088+0000)
>
> {{champion:267}} As the moderator UIanopo stated on your other post about this "posts that have the purpose of harassing, belittling, demeaning or insulting others are not considered "jokes" and are subject to moderation."

https://i.gyazo.com/2c2c579efd04b02a2812c03a410ab057.png

And inside the post, I jokingly added this https://i.gyazo.com/121eaa1fc11d47d07150bbd682e6332e.png saying that if I get "punished" for it, he should be too.

Admit it, you know it's not "moderating", it's censoring.

> [{quoted}](name=Evangele,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=lvLziBRd,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-09-06T01:38:58.088+0000)
>
> {{champion:267}} As the moderator UIanopo stated on your other post about this "posts that have the purpose of harassing, belittling, demeaning or insulting others are not considered "jokes" and are subject to moderation."

is it demeaning to look like a famous show character?

You are not allowed to make jokes. It's the boards staff "safe space" agenda.
It's pretty hilarious if you ask me. It's all just one big joke and them undermining their own authority with these kind of actions.
Also shows incompetence and lack of responsibility.

[Click the image to zoom in]...
Imgur is over capacity


REEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
Because D. said they will give pizza to everyone who protec him. As you can see, D. protec but he also attac.
